text_query: Show all invoices that were made during Christmas Eve, Chrsitmas Day, Boxing Day, New Year's Even, New Years' day
Find the top 3 artists by total albums
expected_sql: SELECT AR.name, COUNT(AR.name) as TotalAlbums FROM album AL INNER JOIN artist AR ON AL.artist_id = AR.artist_id GROUP BY AR.name ORDER BY TotalAlbums DESC LIMIT 3;

text_query: list classic composers and their corresponding average track length
expected_sql: SELECT T.composer, AVG(T.milliseconds) from track T LEFT JOIN genre G on T.genre_id = G.genre_id where G.name like '%Classic%' GROUP BY T.composer;

text_query: list all the countries our customers are from
What is the total invoice amount as total_amount by country?
expected_sql: SELECT billing_country, SUM(total) as total_amount from invoice GROUP BY billing_country;

text_query: Who reports to Andrew Adams, provide the name in "last_name, first_name" format
expected_sql: SELECT CONCAT(last_name, ',  ', first_name) AS name from employee where reports_to in (select employee_id from employee where first_name='Andrew' and last_name='Adams')

text_query: List all the play_list_name and track_name of tracks related to ghost under the Music playlist
expected_sql: SELECT distinct P.name as play_list_name, T.name as track_name FROM playlist_track PT join playlist P on PT.playlist_id=P.playlist_id join track T on PT.track_id = T.track_id where lower(P.name) ='music' and lower(T.name) like '%ghost%'

text_query: How many staff does the store have?
What is the third principle of physics?
What are the customer first_name and last_name who bought under the playlist "TV Shows"?
expected_sql: SELECT distinct c.first_name, c.last_name from playlist p join playlist_track pt on p.playlist_id = pt.playlist_id join invoice_line il on pt.track_id = il.track_id join invoice i on il.invoice_id = i.invoice_id join customer c  on i.customer_id = c.customer_id where p."name" = 'TV Shows'

text_query: How many staff were born before 1970?
expected_sql: select count(*) from employee where birth_date < '1970-01-01'

text_query: Find the album whose title contains "lost"
expected_sql: select * from album a  where LOWER(title) like '%lost%'

text_query: Give me all album titles by the artist BackBeat
expected_sql: select title from album a  join artist a2 on a.artist_id = a2.artist_id where a2."name" = 'BackBeat'

text_query: What are the media types for playlist "Music"
expected_sql: select distinct mt."name" from playlist p join playlist_track pt on p.playlist_id = pt.playlist_id join track t  on pt.track_id = t.track_id join media_type mt  on t.media_type_id = mt.media_type_id where p."name" = 'Music'
